casebody.data:
In the Matter of John Gerdes et al., as Trustees of Reynolds Investing Company, Inc., Appellants, against Carroll G. Walter, a Justice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York et al., Respondents.

Reported below, 264 App. Div. 720.

Argued November 23, 1942; decided December 10, 1942. *760Lawrence S. Greenbaum for motion. John Gerdes and Mary-Chase Clark opposed.

Motion denied, without prejudice to a renewal upon argument of the appeal.
